Omaha.Metcalfe Park:
Metcalfe Park is a small park bearing the namesake of the surrounding neighborhood of Metcalfe, Omaha, Nebraska, located at 1700 Country Club Avenue.


== History ==
In 1938 the park and surrounding four-acre plot was named Metcalfe Park for former mayor of Omaha, Richard Lee Metcalfe.


== Facilities ==
The park has a playground, a long sloping green, and a garden with a sundial.
